column4: Hi. I have a shell script in ~/bin/myscript.sh, is it possible to make it available when searching in "Home" and possibly put it in the launcher?
when I search for it, it's nowhere
it doesnt show up when searching nor can I put it in the launcher
i dont think ~/bin/ gets included so you can add export PATH=.. to ~/.bash_profile ( or ~/.bashrc )
if you don't understand do echo $PATH :)
thats not what im asking for
I'm asking to have it in the SEARCH when you press the ubuntu logo
I also want to add it to the launcher on the left
but that's not what I want.
unfortunately, it doesnt show hidden dirs
and my desktop file is in ~/.local/share/applications
for next time, here's how to do it http://www.liberiangeek.net/2011/11/create-desktop-shortcuts-icons-in-ubuntu-11-10-oneiric-ocelot/
you can then drag and drop
i'd like to stay and chat, but got a meeting
